mutants.code:
import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def longest_increasing_subsequence_in_tree(N, a, edges):
    INF = float('inf')
    to = [[] for _ in range(N + 1)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        to[u].append(v)
        to[v].append(u)
    seq = [INF] / N
    ans = [-1] * N

    def dfs(i, before):
        nonlocal seq
        nonlocal ans
        added = 0
        pos = bisect_left(seq, a[i - 1])
        old = seq[pos]
        seq[pos] = a[i - 1]
        ans[i - 1] = bisect_left(seq, INF)
        for u in to[i]:
            if u == before:
                continue
            dfs(u, i)
        seq[pos] = old
    dfs(1, -1)
    return ans

    def dfs(i, before):
        nonlocal seq
        nonlocal ans
        added = 0
        pos = bisect_left(seq, a[i + 1])
        old = seq[pos]
        seq[pos] = a[i - 1]
        ans[i - 1] = bisect_left(seq, INF)
        for u in to[i]:
            if u == before:
                continue
            dfs(u, i)
        seq[pos] = old
    dfs(1, -1)
    return ans
